app-subtitle: Export books from Wikisources in many different file formats.
logo-alt-text: Wikisource logo, a blue and white illustration of an iceberg.
source-and-docs: The source code is available $1 and some documentation $2.
issues: Please report issues under the $1 project on Phabricator.
previous-alt-text: Backwards-facing arrow icon that indicates that the link returns to Wikisource.
lang-field-help: The Wikisource from which to export the book.
title-field-help: Title of the book or section to export.
format-epub-2: EPUB 2 (deprecated, may be useful for some very old ereaders)
exceeded-rate-limitation: You are making too many requests during a short period of time. Please wait $1 {{PLURAL:$1|minute|minutes}} before reloading this tool, or login to prevent this from happening again.
exception-invalid-format: "$1" is not a valid format. Valid formats are: $2
credits-default-message: [The list of contributors has been omitted as requested.]
nocache-field-label: Bypass all caching (slower but useful for debugging)
cache-updated: The cache has been refreshed for language: $1
exception-rest-page-not-found: The page '$1' could not be found.
error-blocked-1: Your IP address is currently blocked.
error-blocked-2: To prevent abuse from disruptive automation, WS Export denies access from logged out users that are globally blocked on Wikimedia wikis.
error-fix: Please try these steps if you encounter an error:
error-fix-again: Try to download the book again.
error-fix-epub: Try to download the book as an EPUB file.
error-fix-nocredits: Check the box in 'Options' to remove credits
error-fix-noimages: Check the box in 'Options' to remove images.
error-login: Please login to WS Export to continue.
onwikiconfig-failure: Unable to retrieve the on-wiki configuration from: $1
exception-fetching-credits: Error fetching credits information. Please try exporting again. If this error persists, check the box in 'Options' to remove credits.
exception-book-conversion: Error converting the format of the book.
recently-popular-subtext: Most popular downloads from the last three months
